PlayerMarriage.MarriedToNonPolyamorousNP: You or the farmer you are attempting to marry is currently married to a monogamous NPC.
Marriage.NonPolyamorousNPC: My answer is no.#$b#Your partner wouldn't be alright with this.$3
Marriage.IsNonPolyamorousNPC: I can't. I'm not polyamorous like you, and you're already married to someone else.$3
Dating.NonPolyamorousNPC: Sorry, I'm not comfortable dating you right now...$3#$b#$SpouseName$ is monogamous, it just wouldn't be right.
Dating.IsNonPolyamorousNPC: I can't accept this.$1#$b#I'm monogamous... and you're already taken.$3
Config.BuyPendantsAnytime.Name: Buy Pendants Anytime
Config.BuyPendantsAnytime.Description:
Makes the old mariner sell Mermaid's Pendants at anytime.
Default: false
Config.PendantPrice.Name: Mermaid Pendant's Price
Config.PendantPrice.Description:
Change the amount of gold the mariner sells Mermaid's Pendants for.
Default: 5000
Config.PreventHostileDivorces.Name: Prevent Hostile Divorces
Config.ComplexDivorce.Name: Complex Divorce
Config.ComplexDivorce.Description:
Adds an option to the divorce menu for more nuanced divorces.
Default: true
Config.MaxChildren.Name: Max Children
Config.MaxChildren.Description:
Sets the amount of children you can have.
Default: 2
Config.ShowParentNames.Name: Show Parent Names
Config.ShowParentNames.Description: Show's parent names next to children's names
Config.PercentChanceForSpouseInBed.Name: Bed Chance
Config.PercentChanceForSpouseInBed.Descr:
The chance for each spouse to stay in bed on day start.
Default: 25
Config.PercentChanceForSpouseInKitchen.D:
The chance for each spouse to spawn in the kitchen on day start.
Default: 25
Config.PercentChanceForSpouseAtPatio.Des:
The chance for each spouse to spawn in the spouse patio on day start.
Default: 25
divorce_who: Who would you like to divorce?
